title: Optmyzr | SDE1 | Hyderabad
content:

title: Uber | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: CS from Tier 1/1.5
Years of Experience: 2Y 4M
Prior experience: SDE2 at a Unicorn startup
Prior compensation: 50 LPA fixed + 30 LPA ESOPs over 4 years + 2 LPA Bonus
Date of offer: October, 2024
Company: Uber
Title: L4
Location: Bangalore, India
Base: 45 LPA (cash) + 2.7 (EPF) LPA
Annual bonus: 6.75 LPA (Variable)
Relocation bonus: 2 Lac
Stocks: 42300 USD over 4 years
Total first year comp: (Base + PF + Bonus + Stocks) 63.3 LPA
Benefits: Standard Uber benefits worth ~1.5 Lac
